name: Head Hunter
description:
This small game loop pits you against the vile parasites that linger inside the undead. Step into the underworld and survive long enough to break the curse.

*NOTE

This doesn't represent an entire game, but only a small combination of mechanics put together to represent a loop. Feedback on the loop is greatly appreciated and desired. Please press "tab" or "pause" on a controller to answer a few question in the built in form.

Disclaimer:

Everything is in blockout phase so very temp across the board. I prefer to iterate on art as I block out gameplay so mood and shape language should be represented early. The loop technically ends when the curse is lifted...this build doesn't really end.
